subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{liushu|p}} – four dots; few; little. Compare {{och-l|小|small}}, which is depicted by three dots.

subSections.title: Pronunciation 1
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=shǎo
|c=siu2
|h=pfs=séu
|md=ciēu/siēu
|md_note=ciēu - colloquial; siēu - literary
|mn=chió/siáu
|mn_note=chió - vernacular; siáu - literary
|mn-t=ziê2/zio2/siao3
|mn-t_note=ziê2 - Chaozhou, vernacular; zio2 - Shantou, vernacular; siao3 - literary
|w=2sau
|mc=1
|oc=1,1
|ma=y
|cat=det,a,v,adv
}}
